notes: CSV follows Linear importer fields (Title, Description, Priority, Status, Assignee, Created, Completed, Labels, Estimate).
Set target team during import and verify workflow state names before final upload.

issues.title: Unified capture timestamps for audio/video/IMU
issues.description: Implement synchronized capture clock and export trace logs; DoD: max drift <= 50 ms on 20 validation sessions.

issues.title: Depth availability and validity flags in capture contract
issues.description: Add depth availability, confidence validity, and fallback reason fields in ios_capture_v1 payload.

issues.title: AR onboarding for ROI water positioning
issues.description: Build AR setup flow with green ROI zone and readiness checks for angle, water visibility, and exposure.

issues.title: Freeze ios_capture_v1 contract and version policy
issues.description: Publish final schema, compatibility policy, and validation checklist; tag as contract freeze for pilot.

issues.title: Offline replay pipeline for reproducible inference
issues.description: Implement deterministic replay from capture payload to fusion outputs with model/config hash tracing.

issues.title: Capture quality telemetry dashboard stub
issues.description: Create basic dashboard feed for ROI loss, motion, low-SNR, and reject/repeat rates.

issues.title: Clinical operator SOP rollout in pilot site
issues.description: Train at least 2 operators and record competency checklist completion for site readiness.

issues.title: Intended use and non-claims freeze memo
issues.description: Finalize intended use wording and non-claims boundaries; sign off by RA/QA and Clinical Lead.

issues.title: Late-fusion baseline training pipeline
issues.description: Train baseline audio/video/geometry model with reproducible run metadata and artifact registry.

issues.title: Uncertainty calibration for sigma outputs
issues.description: Calibrate sigma_h/sigma_V/sigma_Q against validation set; add uncertainty coverage report.

issues.title: Quality score and valid/repeat/reject policy
issues.description: Tune policy thresholds and document trigger reasons for each status class.

issues.title: Bench stress pack execution
issues.description: Run noise/tilt/lighting/toilet scenarios and generate MAE-RMSE comparison summary.

issues.title: Leave-one-toilet-out generalization test
issues.description: Evaluate robustness across unseen toilets and propose mitigations for outlier failures.

issues.title: Dataset lineage and leakage validation
issues.description: Publish dataset card, split strategy, and leakage check report with signed review.

issues.title: Pilot threat and privacy risk workshop
issues.description: Create risk register with owners, severities, and mitigation deadlines.

issues.title: ICF package finalization for site submission
issues.description: Finalize ICF language with PI and legal review; prepare versioned approval copy.

issues.title: eCRF build and data dictionary approval
issues.description: Implement eCRF fields from dictionary and validate mandatory logic before pilot dry run.

issues.title: Data handling appendix and retention controls
issues.description: Approve retention, de-identification, and role-based access controls for pilot dataset.

issues.title: Statistical Analysis Plan v1.0
issues.description: Freeze SAP with primary and secondary endpoint methods before first patient enrolled.

issues.title: Claims governance rollout to product and marketing
issues.description: Adopt claim registry and release gate checks for app UI, report templates, and website text.

issues.title: Pilot release checklist and DHF index
issues.description: Publish checklist and evidence index; close all blocking compliance gaps.

issues.title: Clinical dry-run sessions (10-15 records)
issues.description: Execute dry-run protocol and capture corrective action list with owners and deadlines.

issues.title: Model freeze release fusion_v0.1.0
issues.description: Freeze model artifact and add hash injection into every generated summary report.

issues.title: End-to-end audit trail verification
issues.description: Verify each session is traceable to app version, model hash, config, and operator action logs.

issues.title: Incident response tabletop drill
issues.description: Run access breach drill and close resulting corrective actions.

issues.title: Pilot kickoff runbook and handoff
issues.description: Deliver single runbook covering SOP flow, escalation, contacts, and daily reporting format.

issues.title: Go-NoGo governance board decision
issues.description: Hold formal board review and publish signed go/no-go decision with blockers or launch approval.
